channel.title: Wifi help please
channel.description: Guys, I am totally stumped. Out of no where today, my wireless connection has begun saying "No internet access" and I can't go anywhere online or play any RuneScape private server. Ever since it began happening, it's been saying that for longer amounts of time. So at first it was only a few seconds, now it's been taking a few minutes until I re-gain internet access. I haven't installed anything or ran any executables lately, don't have any viruses, I obtain my DNS and IP addresses automatically, and a few minutes ago I installed the newest firmware update of my router and I'm still losing internet. I have a NetGear WNDR3400 router if that helps. Please help me! I have no clue what to do. :|

item.title: Wifi help please
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

My wireless adapter just sucks balls. I lose internet all the time

Read full topic

item.title: Wifi help please
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

r0ckstar96:

Removed the password to join my wireless and I haven’t had any problems yet Thanks

Np just try and fidget with it for a while to see if your computer knows your wifi password and auto logs onto it. Cause its not to good to have open wireless if you are near others

Read full topic

item.title: Wifi help please
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Removed the password to join my wireless and I haven’t had any problems yet Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Wifi help please
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Make sure your computer is set up to connect to the wifi as soon as you start it up. This use to happen to me alot but it was fixed when I put a password on it fully. Sometimes its best to connect to it without security on and then when you can connect turn on the security password and add it into your computer. Thats what fixed mine. Goodluck <3

Read full topic

item.title: Wifi help please
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Guys, I am totally stumped. Out of no where today, my wireless connection has begun saying “No internet access” and I can’t go anywhere online or play any RuneScape private server. Ever since it began happening, it’s been saying that for longer amounts of time. So at first it was only a few seconds, now it’s been taking a few minutes until I re-gain internet access. I haven’t installed anything or ran any executables lately, don’t have any viruses, I obtain my DNS and IP addresses automatically, and a few minutes ago I installed the newest firmware update of my router and I’m still losing internet. I have a NetGear WNDR3400 router if that helps.
Please help me! I have no clue what to do.
